page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: SMALL CHILDREN PLAY CIRCLE GAMES LIKE"FARMER IN THE DEN"-A CIRCLE OF CHILDREN WITH FARMER IN THE MIDDLE WHO CHOOSES A WIFE,CHILD,NURSE,DOG AND BONE.THEY PLAY AT SKIPPING:A CHILD AT EACH END OF A ROPE AND SOMEONE JUMPING OVER THE ROPE IN THE MIDDLE. GAMES AT SCHOOL ENJOYED BY EVERYONE ARE NETBALL AND HOCKEY FOR GIRLS ; FOOTBALL FOR BOYS AND ROUNDERS AND SOFTBALL FOR BOTH. THESES ARE TEAM BALL GAMES. CHILDREN PLAY CARD GAMES SUCH AS TRUMPS,PONTOON,SNAP,WHIST AND CRIBBAGE AT HOME. THE LATEST GAMES ARE COMPUTER GAMES,POPULAR WITH ALL CHILDREN INOUR CLASS ALREADY 19 PEOPLE HAVE THEIR OWN COMPUTER.THE FAVOURITE IS "CHUKIE EGG" A GAME OF SPEED. THERE ARE VARIATIONS OF HIDE AND SEEK. BOYS PLAY WAR OR CRICKET IN THE SUMMER
